sys_script_include.name: IsMyDirectReportee

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_a8c5cb3edbcc2010819f62dc13961984
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_snc_delegated_au.IsMyDirectReportee</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><name>IsMyDirectReportee</name><script><![CDATA[var IsMyDirectReportee = Class.create();
IsMyDirectReportee.prototype = Object.extendsObject(global.AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
	getMyDirectReports: function() {
        gs.info('entering into loop');
        var answer = new Array();
        var i = 0;
        var repManager = gs.getUserID();
        var reportees = new GlideRecord('sys_user');
        reportees.addQuery('manager', repManager);
        reportees.query();
        while (reportees.next()) {
            answer[i++] = reportees.sys_id.toString();
        }
        return answer;
    },

    type: 'IsMyDirectReportee'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>Vincent.Hou</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-10-28 06:48:51</sys_created_on><sys_id>a8c5cb3edbcc2010819f62dc13961984</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>IsMyDirectReportee</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Delegated Authority Limits" source="x_snc_delegated_au">0dca54621be5d8100e7543f28d4bcbc6</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="Delegated Authority Limits">0dca54621be5d8100e7543f28d4bcbc6</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_a8c5cb3edbcc2010819f62dc13961984</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>Vincent.Hou</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-10-28 06:48:51</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
